name: Ulysses S Grant National Historic Site
description: Ulysses S. Grant is known as the victorious Civil War general who saved the Union and the 18th President of the United States. He first met Julia Dent, his future wife, at her family home, named White Haven. From 1854 to 1859 the Dents, Grants and an enslaved African-American workforce lived on the property.
shortDescription: Ulysses S. Grant is known as the victorious Civil War general who saved the Union and the 18th President of the United States. He first met Julia Dent, his future wife, at her family home, named White...

operatingHours.description: Ulysses S. Grant National Historic Site’s hours of operation are 9AM – 5PM, with the last tour of the historic house at 4 pm.

climate.weatherDescription: St. Louis weather can be uncomfortable and occasionally severe, so please plan your visit accordingly. High heat and humidity, severe thunderstorms, snow and ice, and extreme cold are all possible depending upon the season. For an update of inclement weather conditions which may affect your visit, call (314)842-1867 and follow the instructions to connect to the inclement weather report.

images.title: White Haven in Autumn
images.altText: View of house with fence. Autumn colored leaves on trees
images.caption: White Haven is picturesque in all seasons, but in the fall the trees are especially beautiful.

images.title: White Haven
images.altText: view of house from side and back. The house has several additions. Stone summer kitchen on right
images.caption: Behind the house is stone summer kitchen.

images.title: Outbuildings
images.altText: To the left is the ice house and to right is chicken house.
images.caption: Ice house and chicken house behind the main house.

images.title: Museum Exhibits
images.altText: boy looking at touchscreen in museum
images.caption: The interactive museum is located in the historic stable.

images.title: Winter at White Haven
images.altText: Historic green house with snow on ground
images.caption: Visiting the park in the winter can be beautiful and peaceful.

images.title: White Haven in Early Spring
images.altText: View of house from front with budding tree branch in foreground that is also covered in ice.
images.caption: Snowfall in early spring.
